title: Easter cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the cakes', '115g (4oz) softened butter or margarine', '115g (4oz) caster sugar', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '85g (3oz) self-raising flour', '25g (1oz) cocoa powder (optional - for chocolate cupcakes)', 'For the topping', '85g (3oz) softened butter', '175g (6oz) icing sugar', '1 tablespoon milk', '3 drops vanilla extract', '2 packets mini eggs']
